alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN WAKULLA... SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN TAYLOR COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Woodville to 19 miles southeast of St. Marks to 14 miles south of Perry. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Newport, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Hyde Park, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Plum Orchard, Scanlon, Shell Point, Econfina, Port Leon, Wakulla Beach, Fanlew, Wacissa, Spring Creek, Wacissa Springs, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, and Liveoak Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
